ben_description: Ben runs our studio in Bremen. As an integrated designer, proximity to our customers is particularly important to him: for him, the design process means accompanying people on the way to a sustainable solution. In the end, the result ensures a high level of satisfaction and enthusiasm. As a workshop leader or lecturer, Ben ensures clarity after brainstorming sessions and can quickly recognise connections. His mix of pragmatism, creativity and empathy makes him a master of human-centred design.
astrid_description: The Berlin studio is run by Astrid. Her focus is on innovation and holistic design approaches: As a designer, problems are first deconstructed and then reassembled. This leads to customised solutions. In independent projects and workshops, Astrid develops new formats and methods and quickly recognises the potential in ideas, products and cross-disciplinary collaborations.
partners_description: In the implementation of our projects, we work with talented people who support us with their expertise.
